property.name: fieldLabel
property.label: Field Label
property.description: The label that appears above the field.

property.name: fieldValue
property.label: Field Value
property.description: To provide a value set this attribute value.

property.name: fieldType
property.label: Field DataType
property.description: Valid input types are checkbox, date, datetime, time, email, password, phone, url, number, text (default), toggle.
